price: 86 et pardonner à mon père qui est du nombre des égarés.
arabic: وَٱغۡفِرۡ لِأَبِيٓ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-igh'fir li-abī innahu kāna mina al-ḍālīna
